CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of numbers indicates when to auto-send reminder and overdue emails for forms not yet submitted. For example, "-10, -5, 20" sends reminders 10 and 5 days before date due, and an overdue notice 20 days after date due.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma-separated list of numbers indicates when to auto-send reminder and overdue emails for forms not yet submitted. For example, "-10, -5, 20" sends reminders 10 and 5 days before date due, and an overdue notice 20 days after date due.
CustomField.label: Reminder/overdue number of days
